item.title: Automated Weekly Review in Obsidian
item.description: mode:: #mode/youtuberüèôÔ∏è kind:: #Project/Articlesüì∞ status:: #Status/Focus‚ùó (post in progress, here are some quick notes) waiting for when I summarize YT Video - automated weekly review in obsidian and maybe the comment I had explaining where the weekly review fits into daily schedule What’s in a Weekly Review Purpose of the weekly review Based off GTD Structure of my weekly review Video I have a video on this at Obsidian Workflow: Speed up your Weekly Review - YouTube
